answers.answer: It would not hurt to get a scan to make sure that there is not a brain tumor.  I have these same symptoms and am wondering myself.  Old age, strokes, brain tumor, neurological disease, low blood sugar, any of these could be the causes.

question: ok i have been having problems for a long time now probably a year or two.  i have brought these symptoms to my doctors attention but he passes them off as nothing is wrong with me. he checked me for diabetes and my blood sugar was fine.i havent felt like myself, i stumble with my words and mix them up, i have bad headaches that tylenol wont touch, im tired a lot, my peripheral vision isnt what it use to be, and when i hear sounds, i cant tell if it came from behind my or to my left or where it came from.i am really getting worried about this considering i dont feel normal like i use to and my doctor doesnt seem to think anything is wrong. i just want to know what other people think.im a 19 year old male that is somewhat active and played a lot of sports in high school
title: not like myself
